1.title: IMDb Exclusive #125 - Donald Glover
1.plot: Donald Glover is a multi-talented actor, writer, producer, director, and musical artist who plays Lando Calrissian in 'Solo: A Star Wars Story.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at his eclectic career.

2.title: IMDb Exclusive #126 - Shannon Woodward
2.plot: Shannon Woodward stars as Dina in the upcoming survival video game "The Last of Us: Part II" and plays Elsie, a quick-witted, sarcastic host programmer on HBO's "Westworld." "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of Shannon's most memorable roles over the years.

3.title: IMDb Exclusive #128 - Craig T. Nelson
3.plot: Craig T. Nelson, an actor perhaps best known for his starring roles on "Coach" and "Parenthood," reprises his role as Bob Parr/Mr. Incredible in Pixar's 'Incredibles 2.' What other roles has he played over the years?

4.title: IMDb Exclusive #129 - Vicky Kaushal
4.plot: Vicky Kaushal, one of the latest rising stars of Indian cinema, stars in the upcoming film 'Sanju,' a biopic about Bollywood actor Sanjay Dutt. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his eclectic acting career.

5.title: IMDb Exclusive #130 - Noel Clarke
5.plot: Noel Clarke is known for his acting work in "Doctor Who" and "Bulletproof," but is perhaps more well-known as an award-winning writer, producer, and director. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his eclectic career in entertainment.

6.title: IMDb Exclusive #131 - Judy Greer
6.plot: Judy Greer is perhaps best known for playing Kitty Sanchez in "Arrested Development" as well as a wide variety of "best friend" characters in romantic comedies. What other roles has she played?

7.title: IMDb Exclusive #132 - Ezra Miller
7.plot: Ezra Miller, an actor who's made a name for himself playing odd, outcast characters, currently stars in the 'Justice League' and 'Fantastic Beasts' franchises. What other roles has he played over the years?

8.title: IMDb Exclusive #133 - Dolph Lundgren
8.plot: Dolph Lundgren, star of the upcoming films 'Aquaman' and 'Creed II,' has had a long career as an action star ever since playing Ivan Drago in 'Rocky IV.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of his work.

9.title: IMDb Exclusive #134 - Mark Margolis
9.plot: Legendary character actor Mark Margolis, who returns as Hector Salamanca in the new season of "Better Call Saul," has been acting in film and television since 1976 in projects like 'Scarface,' 'Ace Ventura: Pet Detective,' as well as several of Darren Aronofsky's films. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his memorable roles over the years.

10.title: IMDb Exclusive #135 - Awkwafina
10.plot: Awkwafina is a rapper/comedian/online personality/talk show host who is part of an all-Asian cast in the film 'Crazy Rich Asians.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at her eclectic career in entertainment.

11.title: IMDb Exclusive #136 - Julia Garner
11.plot: Julia Garner, previously known for her roles in critically acclaimed indies such as'Martha Marcy May Marlene' and 'Electrick Children,' returns in the second season of "Ozark" as crafty criminal Ruth Langmore. What other roles has she played over the years?

12.title: IMDb Exclusive #137 - Rachel Brosnahan
12.plot: Actress Rachel Brosnahan is known for her performances in "House of Cards" and "The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel," for which she's won a Primetime Emmy. "No Small Parts" takes a look at her eclectic acting career.

13.title: IMDb Exclusive #138 - Guy Pearce
13.plot: Guy Pearce, perhaps best known for his roles in 'Memento' and 'L.A. Confidential,' stars in the new Netflix series "The Innocents." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his eclectic acting career.

14.title: IMDb Exclusive #139 - Radhika Apte
14.plot: Actress Radhika Apte, a rising star in Indian cinema, is perhaps best known for her roles in such films as 'Badlapur,' 'Parched,' and recent Netflix projects like 'Lust Stories,' "Sacred Games," and "Ghoul." "No Small Parts" takes a look at her eclectic acting career.

15.title: IMDb Exclusive #140 - Claire Foy
15.plot: British actress Claire Foy is perhaps best known for her roles in various period dramas like "Little Dorrit," "Wolf Hall," and her Primetime Emmy Award-winning performance as Queen Elizabeth II in the first two seasons of "The Crown."

16.title: IMDb Exclusive #141 - Millie Bobby Brown
16.plot: Millie Bobby Brown is perhaps best known as Eleven in the Netflix series "Stranger Things" and stars in the upcoming action/thriller 'Godzilla: King of the Monsters.' What other roles has she played over the years?

17.title: IMDb Exclusive #142 - Boyd Holbrook
17.plot: Boyd Holbrook, perhaps best known for his confident performances in 'Logan' and "Narcos," stars in the latest installment of the 'Predator' franchise 'The Predator.' What other roles has he played over the years?

18.title: IMDb Exclusive #143 - David Harbour
18.plot: David Harbour rose to fame for his Emmy-nominated performance as police chief Jim Hopper in "Stranger Things" and stars in the upcoming 'Hellboy' reboot. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his acting career.

19.title: IMDb Exclusive #144 - Lady Gaga
19.plot: Award-winning musical artist and actress Lady Gaga has garnered critical acclaim for her performance in Bradley Cooper's adaptation of 'A Star Is Born.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at Gaga's acting career.

20.title: IMDb Exclusive #145 - Corey Stoll
20.plot: Acting chameleon Corey Stoll, known for his roles in "House of Cards," "The Strain," and 'Ant-Man,' plays astronaut Buzz Aldrin in 'First Man.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at his eclectic acting career.

21.title: IMDb Exclusive #146 - Ayushmann Khurrana
21.plot: Ayushmann Khurrana, perhaps best known for his starring roles in 'Vicky Donor' and 'Dum Laga Ke Haisha,' stars in two very different films: the thriller 'Andhadhun' and the comedy-drama 'Badhaai Ho.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at his career in entertainment.

22.title: IMDb Exclusive #147 - Andrew Lincoln
22.plot: Andrew Lincoln is making season nine of "The Walking Dead" his last, and with that, "No Small Parts" takes a look at his acting career before playing Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes.

23.title: IMDb Exclusive #148 - Cody Fern
23.plot: Cody Fern has made a big impression for his dramatic roles in "American Crime Story" and "American Horror Story," and plays a mysterious, pivotal role in the final season of "House of Cards." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his short but impressive IMDb resumé.

24.title: IMDb Exclusive #149 - Rashida Jones
24.plot: Rashida Jones, perhaps best known for her comedic performances in "The Office," "Parks and Recreation," and "Angie Tribeca," lends her voice to the new animated feature 'The Grinch.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at her multifaceted career in film and television.

25.title: IMDb Exclusive #150 - Michael Peña
25.plot: Actor Michael Peña, star of 'Crash' and the 'Ant-Man' films, stars in the "Narcos" reboot "Narcos: Mexico" as DEA Agent Kiki Camarena. "No Small Parts" takes a look at Michael's rise in film and television.

26.title: IMDb Exclusive #151 - Connie Britton
26.plot: Four-time Emmy nominee Connie Britton, perhaps best known for her performances in "Friday Night Lights" and "Nashville," plays Debra Newell in the new Bravo series "Dirty John." What are some of her other roles?

27.title: IMDb Exclusive #152 - Alex Borstein
27.plot: Emmy Award-winning comic actress Alex Borstein continues to play Midge Maisel's manager, Susie Myerson, in "The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel," as well as Lois Griffin in "Family Guy." "No Small Parts" takes a look at her various performances, both in front of the camera and behind the microphone.

28.title: Stars Early Parts - Jeff Goldblum
28.plot: Jeff Goldblum, known for playing oddly unique characters in projects like 'The Fly,' 'Jurassic Park,' 'Independence Day,' and 'The Grand Budapest Hotel,' plays The Wolf King in 'Hotel Artemis.' What are some early roles that Jeff played?

29.title: Stars Early Parts - Tom Cruise
29.plot: Tom Cruise is the very definition of a movie star, but what were some of his early credits?

30.title: Stars Early Parts - Denzel Washington
30.plot: Before Denzel became the legendary Oscar-winning actor we know today, he tackled these early parts. How many do you remember?

31.title: Stars Early Parts - Emma Stone
31.plot: Before Emma Stone won an Oscar for 'La La Land' and delivered performances in 'The Favourite' and Netflix's "Maniac," she struggled like any actress might in a series of brief television roles. What were some of Emma's earlier roles?

32.title: IMDb Exclusive #153 - Shameik Moore
32.plot: Musician, dancer, and actor Shameik Moore, perhaps best known for his breakout performance in the 2015 indie film 'Dope,' stars as Miles Morales in 'Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse.' What other roles has he played?

33.title: IMDb Exclusive #154 - Alexander Ludwig
33.plot: Alexander Ludwig continues to headline the History Channel series "Vikings" as Bjorn Lothbrok. From child actor to Nordic warrior, "No Small Parts" takes a look at his rise to fame.

34.title: IMDb Exclusive #155 - Alison Pill
34.plot: Alison Pill, an unconventional actress known for her characters in 'Scott Pilgrim vs. the World' and "The Newsroom" plays Mary Cheney in the upcoming Dick Cheney biopic 'Vice.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at Alison's rise to fame from her early days as a child actress.

35.title: IMDb Exclusive #156 - Darren Criss
35.plot: Actor and musician Darren Criss is perhaps best known for his roles in "Glee" and "American Crime Story," for which he's been nominated for a Golden Globe. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his eclectic career in entertainment.

36.title: IMDb Exclusive #157 - Sandra Oh
36.plot: Actress Sandra Oh, perhaps best known for playing Cristina Yang on "Grey's Anatomy," is nominated for a Golden Globe for her performance in the dramatic series "Killing Eve." "No Small Parts" takes a look at her vast career of supporting characters.

37.title: IMDb Exclusive #158 - Constance Wu
37.plot: Constance Wu, known for her performances in milestone projects "Fresh Off the Boat" and 'Crazy Rich Asians,' has been nominated for a Golden Globe. "No Small Parts" takes a look at her rise to fame.

38.title: IMDb Exclusive #159 - Lucas Hedges
38.plot: Lucas Hedges has already starred in critically-acclaimed films like 'Lady Bird,' 'Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri,' and 'Manchester by the Sea,' for which he was nominated for an Academy Award. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his rise to fame.

39.title: IMDb Exclusive #160 - Chiwetel Ejiofor
39.plot: Chiwetel Ejiofor, known for his performances in films like '12 Years a Slave' and 'Kinky Boots,' stars as iconic Disney villain Scar in Jon Favreau's new adaptation of 'The Lion King' and has directed his first feature, 'The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at his impressive resumé.

1.title: Anne Ramsey
1.plot: In this first episode, I talk about character actress Anne Ramsey, who is perhaps best known for playing Mama Fratelli in "The Goonies" and Mrs. Lift in "Throw Momma From The Train."

2.title: Vincent Schiavelli
2.plot: My second episode focuses on the life and career of Vincent Schiavelli, known for his roles in One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest, Ghost, Man on the Moon, and countless other films and TV shows throughout the 70s, 80s, 90s, and 00s.

3.title: Scatman Crothers

1.title: IMDb Exclusive #1 - Michael Kelly
1.plot: Michael Kelly is perhaps best known for playing Doug Stamper on the popular Netflix series "House of Cards," but what did he do before that? Since the late '90s, he's been a reliable character actor performing small, subtle roles in films and crime dramas on television.

2.title: IMDb Exclusive #2 - Norman Reedus
2.plot: Norman Reedus has been a fan favorite for years as Daryl in "The Walking Dead." What did he do before picking up the crossbow? And what makes his portrayal of Daryl unique?

3.title: IMDb Exclusive #3 - Melissa McBride
3.plot: Melissa McBride is best known for playing housewife-turned-warrior Carol Peletier on "The Walking Dead." What was her acting career like before being a fan favorite on the celebrated AMC series?

4.title: IMDb Exclusive #4 - Jeffrey Dean Morgan
4.plot: We take a look at the career of Jeffrey Dean Morgan before he started in his breakout role of Negan on "The Walking Dead." Can you recognize him in these early roles?

5.title: IMDb Exclusive #5 - Domhnall Gleeson
5.plot: Brief career bio celebrating the Irish actors growing success of recent years and showcasing a wide and varied range of recognizable characters Domhnall Gleeson has played.

6.title: IMDb Exclusive #6 - Gwendoline Christie
6.plot: Gwendoline Christie is known for playing Brienne of Tarth on "Game of Thrones" and Captain Phasma in 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens.' Before nailing those auditions, what other acting work did she do?

7.title: IMDb Exclusive #7 - Alfie Allen
7.plot: Versatile and talented actor Alfie Allen is best known for playing Theon Greyjoy/Reek on "Game of Thrones." What prior roles helped him prepare for one of the most popular shows on television?

8.title: IMDb Exclusive #8 - Oscar Isaac
8.plot: Oscar Isaac is a versatile actor who's starred in many movies since the mid 1990s. Before starring as Poe Dameron in 'Star Wars: The Force Awakens,' what other roles did he bring to life?

9.title: IMDb Exclusive #9 - Paul Bettany
9.plot: Classically-trained actor Paul Bettany plays Vision, one of the newest larger-than-life additions to the Marvel Universe. What other roles is he known for?

10.title: IMDb Exclusive #10 - Liam Cunningham
10.plot: After leaving a career as an electrician, Irish character actor Liam Cunningham set his sights on acting. What were some highlights from his career before "Game of Thrones"?

11.title: IMDb Exclusive #11 - Rory McCann
11.plot: Fan favorite "Game of Thrones" character Sandor Clegane, otherwise known as "The Hound," is played by the versatile, menacing Rory McCann. What are some other roles McCann played over the years?

12.title: IMDb Exclusive #12 - Joseph Gilgun
12.plot: British actor Joseph Gilgun, who plays the charismatic Irish vampire, Cassidy, in AMC's newest series "Preacher," is no stranger to playing the lovable rebel. What other similar roles has he played in his career?

13.title: IMDb Exclusive #13 - Aidan Gillen
13.plot: Versatile everyman Aidan Gillen plays the mysterious, scheming Petyr 'Littlefinger' Baelish on "Game of Thrones." What are some other interesting roles he's played over the years?

14.title: IMDb Exclusive #14 - Jeff Goldblum
14.plot: Jeff Goldblum has been entertaining audiences for years with his endearing, eccentric characters. What qualities make Goldblum so unique?

15.title: IMDb Exclusive #15 - Jimmy Kimmel
15.plot: Jimmy Kimmel is hosting the 2016 Primetime Emmy Awards, his second time leading the proceedings since 2012. Besides writing, producing, and hosting a variety of comedy projects over the years, what are some of Jimmy's acting roles?

16.title: IMDb Exclusive #16 - Anton Yelchin
16.plot: Fans around the world were shocked and saddened with the passing of multi-talented actor Anton Yelchin. "No Small Parts" offers a brief retrospective of his career.

17.title: IMDb Exclusive #17 - Kodi Smit-McPhee
17.plot: Australian actor Kodi Smit-McPhee stars as Nightcrawler in X-Men: Apocalypse. Acting since the age of ten, what are some other roles he's played over the years?

18.title: IMDb Exclusive #18 - Rami Malek
18.plot: Rami Malek's portrayal of anxiety-ridden hacker Elliot Alderson, the protagonist of "Mr. Robot," has brought him critical acclaim. What are some other roles he's played over the years?

19.title: IMDb Exclusive #19 - Alden Ehrenreich
19.plot: Alden Ehrenreich plays a young Han Solo in the upcoming film 'Solo: A Star Wars Story.' But before sitting in the pilot's chair of the Millennium Falcon, what other roles did he play?

20.title: IMDb Exclusive #20 - Dominic Cooper
20.plot: British actor Dominic Cooper is the star of AMC's newest and much talked-about show, "Preacher." What are some other roles he's played throughout his career?

21.title: IMDb Exclusive #21 - Ruth Negga
21.plot: Versatile actress Ruth Negga currently plays lead roles in AMC's "Preacher" and the upcoming romantic drama 'Loving.' What other projects has she acted in over the years?

22.title: IMDb Exclusive #21 - Adewale Akinnuoye Agbaje
22.plot: Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje plays "Killer Croc" in the new film 'Suicide Squad.' What other roles has he played over the years?

23.title: IMDb Exclusive #23 - Millie Bobby Brown
23.plot: Millie Bobby Brown is perhaps best known as Eleven in the Netflix series "Stranger Things" and stars in the upcoming action/thriller 'Godzilla: King of the Monsters.' What other roles has she played over the years?

24.title: IMDb Exclusive #24 - Riz Ahmed
24.plot: Riz Ahmed, star of the HBO limited series "The Night Of," has had an acting career that not only showcases his talents to the fullest, but serves as a example of an actor successfully breaking out of the usual stereotypical roles.

25.title: IMDb Exclusive #25 - Maggie Smith
25.plot: Dame Maggie Smith has been nominated for the fifth time for her performance as Violet Crawley in the BBC/PBS series "Downton Abbey." "No Small Parts" takes a look at three of her most iconic roles.

26.title: IMDb Exclusive #26 - Portia Doubleday
26.plot: Portia Doubleday plays Angela Moss on the popular USA series "Mr. Robot." What other roles has she played over the years?

27.title: IMDb Exclusive #27 - Idris Elba
27.plot: Idris Elba has been nominated for an Emmy for the lead role in the British detective series "Luther." What other interesting roles has he played over the years?

28.title: IMDb Exclusive #28 - Peter Dinklage
28.plot: 2016 marks the sixth year Peter Dinklage has been nominated for an Emmy for his portrayal of Tyrion Lannister on the HBO series "Game of Thrones." "No Small Parts" takes a look at some roles in his career that subverted stereotypes.

29.title: IMDb Exclusive #29 - Mahershala Ali
29.plot: Mahershala Ali, perhaps best known for playing lobbyist Remy Danton on "House of Cards," plays the antagonist in the new Marvel series "Luke Cage." What other roles has he played over the years?

30.title: IMDb Exclusive #30 - Jimmi Simpson
30.plot: Jimmi Simpson, one of the stars of HBO's newest series "Westworld," has been turning in memorable performances in comedy and drama for years. "No Small Parts" takes a look at Simpson's versatile acting career.

31.title: IMDb Exclusive #31 - Chrissy Metz
31.plot: Actress Chrissy Metz's role in the dramedy series "This Is Us" manages to break stereotypes of overweight characters in film and television. What other roles did she play over the years?

32.title: IMDb Exclusive #32 - Kelly Macdonald
32.plot: Scottish actress Kelly Macdonald stars in the finale of the newest season of "Black Mirror." Since her film debut in the 1996 film 'Trainspotting,' what are some other highlights from her career?

33.title: IMDb Exclusive #33 - Steven Yeun
33.plot: For the past six years, actor Steven Yeun has portrayed Glenn, a fan favorite on AMC's "The Walking Dead." How did Steven get his start, and what other roles has he played over the years?

34.title: IMDb Exclusive #34 - Steven Ogg
34.plot: No stranger to playing unsavory characters, "Walking Dead" star Steven Ogg has been making a living as an actor and voice-over artist for nearly twenty years. What other projects has he acted in?

35.title: IMDb Exclusive #35 - Khary Payton
35.plot: Veteran voiceover actor Khary Payton plays King Ezekiel, the newest character in "The Walking Dead" series. "No Small Parts" takes a look at some notable voices he's provided over the years.

36.title: IMDb Exclusive #36 - Dan Fogler
36.plot: Character actor Dan Fogler, known mostly for comedic roles, plays Jacob Kowalski in the new fantasy film 'Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them.' What other roles has Dan played over the years?

37.title: IMDb Exclusive #37 - Danai Gurira
37.plot: Danai Gurira plays the samurai sword-wielding Michonne on AMC's "The Walking Dead." What other projects has this longtime champion for strong female roles appeared in?

38.title: IMDb Exclusive #38 - Katheryn Winnick
38.plot: In her role as Lagertha on the History's "Vikings," Katheryn Winnick is able to show off her three decades of experience as a black-belt martial artist. "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of her other more athletic roles over the years.

39.title: IMDb Exclusive #39 - Jeffrey Wright
39.plot: "Westworld" star Jeffrey Wright has been known in recent years for playing brainy characters. "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of the more diverse roles he's played over the years.

40.title: IMDb Exclusive #40 - Ben Mendelsohn
40.plot: In recent years, Australian actor Ben Mendelsohn, who plays the primary antagonist in 'Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,' has received international recognition for his roles in film and television. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his vast career.

41.title: IMDb Exclusive #41 - Alden Ehrenreich
41.plot: Alden Ehrenreich plays a young Han Solo in the upcoming film 'Solo: A Star Wars Story.' But before sitting in the pilot's chair of the Millennium Falcon, what other roles did he play?

42.title: IMDb Exclusive #42 - Peter Billingsley
42.plot: When Peter Billingsley was just 12 years old, he landed the part of Ralphie in the iconic Christmas movie 'A Christmas Story.' What other roles did he have as a child, and what is he up to today?

43.title: IMDb Exclusive #43 - Thandie Newton
43.plot: Actress Thandie Newton has been nominated for a Golden Globe Award for her performance as Maeve in the HBO's "Westworld." Take a closer look at her role, as well as other significant parts she's played over the years.

44.title: IMDb Exclusive #44 - Hailee Steinfeld
44.plot: Acting since the age of 8, Academy Award-nominated actress Hailee Steinfeld has received critical acclaim for her role in the coming-of-age comedy 'The Edge of Seventeen.' What other roles has she played over the years?

45.title: IMDb Exclusive #45 - Casey Affleck
45.plot: Ben Affleck's younger brother Casey has been nominated for a Golden Globe for his role in the new critically-acclaimed drama 'Manchester by the Sea.' Take a look at some of his earlier roles.

46.title: IMDb Exclusive #46 - Phyllis Smith
46.plot: Phyllis Smith, known mostly for her comedic work in "The Office" and her voiceover work as Sadness in Pixar's 'Inside Out,' plays a more serious role in the Netflix series "The OA." "No Small Parts" takes a look at how she got into acting, and the various other parts she's played over the years.

47.title: IMDb Exclusive #47 - Patrick Gibson
47.plot: Irish actor Patrick Gibson plays Steve Winchell in the new Netflix series "The OA." What other projects has he appeared in over the years?

48.title: IMDb Exclusive #48 - Corey Hawkins
48.plot: 'Straight Outta Compton' star Corey Hawkins plays Eric Carter, the new lead character in the "24" spinoff "24: Legacy." What are some other roles he's played over the years?

49.title: IMDb Exclusive #49 - Sheila Vand
49.plot: Actress and artist Sheila Vand, known for her work in "Argo" and "A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night," plays Nilaa in the new "24" spin-off "24: Legacy." "No Small Parts" takes a look at her acting career.

50.title: IMDb Exclusive #50 - Dev Patel
50.plot: Actor Dev Patel, known for his roles in 'Slumdog Millionaire' and 'The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel,' has been nominated for an Oscar for his performance in the 2016 drama 'Lion.' What other roles has he played over the years?

51.title: IMDb Exclusive #51 - Naomie Harris
51.plot: British actress Naomie Harris has been nominated for an Oscar for her role as a crack-addicted mother in the 2016 indie drama 'Moonlight.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at some other roles she's played in her career.

52.title: IMDb Exclusive #52 - Michael Shannon
52.plot: Character actor Michael Shannon has been nominated for his second Oscar for his role in the 2016 thriller 'Nocturnal Animals.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of the other characters he's played in the past.

53.title: IMDb Exclusive #53 - James Hong
53.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

54.title: IMDb Exclusive #54 - Dan Stevens
54.plot: British actor Dan Stevens plays schizophrenic mutant David Haller in FX's new Marvel series "Legion." "No Small Parts" takes a look at how this role, among others, is different from the upper-class British characters Dan predominantly used to play.

55.title: IMDb Exclusive #55 - Stephen Merchant
55.plot: Stephen Merchant, known primarily in the acting world for his slightly nerdy, awkward characters, plays a much different role as Caliban in the final Wolverine film 'Logan.' What other roles has he played over the years?

56.title: IMDb Exclusive #56 - John C. Reilly
56.plot: Oscar-nominated every man John C. Reilly is one of the most versatile actors around today. "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of his roles in dramas, comedies, and everything in between.

57.title: IMDb Exclusive #57 - Josh Gad
57.plot: Comic actor and Broadway veteran Josh Gad plays LeFou, Gaston's enthusiastic yes man in the live-action adaptation of Disney's 'Beauty and the Beast.' What other roles has Josh played over the years?

58.title: IMDb Exclusive #58 - Wentworth Miller
58.plot: Wentworth Miller is returning to FOX this April in a revival of the popular drama "Prison Break." "No Small Parts" takes a look at some other roles Wentworth has played over the years.

59.title: IMDb Exclusive #59 - Dominic Purcell
59.plot: Australian actor Dominic Purcell is reprising his character of Lincoln Burrows in the fifth season revival of the FOX popular drama "Prison Break." What are some other roles he's played over the years?

60.title: IMDb Exclusive #60 - Pilou Asbæk
60.plot: Danish actor Pilou Asbaek plays Batou in the new sci-fi film 'Ghost in the Shell,' as well as Euron Greyjoy in HBO's "Game of Thrones." What other roles has he played over the years?

61.title: IMDb Exclusive #61 - Giancarlo Esposito
61.plot: Giancarlo Esposito, best known for playing drug kingpin Gustavo Fring in "Breaking Bad," has played a wide range of characters over the years. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his accomplished acting career.

62.title: IMDb Exclusive #62 - Peter Capaldi
62.plot: Scottish actor and Academy Award winner Peter Capaldi returns for his last season as The Doctor in the beloved British sci-fi serial "Doctor Who." "No Small Parts" takes a look at some other eccentric or unusual roles he's played throughout his career.

63.title: IMDb Exclusive #63 - Bill Skarsård
63.plot: Swedish actor Bill Skarsgard plays the terrifying character of "It" in the remake of Stephen King's popular horror story 'It.' What are some other roles he's played over the years?

64.title: IMDb Exclusive #64 - Ian McShane
64.plot: Veteran character actor Ian McShane, who plays Mr. Wednesday in the Starz! series "American Gods," has grown accustomed to playing characters with a great deal of power. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his long, successful career.

65.title: IMDb Exclusive #65 - Michael Rooker
65.plot: Character actor Michael Rooker, who returns as Yondu in "Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2," has made a name for himself playing characters who are a little rough around the edges.

66.title: IMDb Exclusive #66 - Carmen Ejogo
66.plot: Multi-talented British actress Carmen Ejogo plays Karine, one of several crew members on a mission to colonize a remote planet in Ridley Scott's 'Alien: Covenant.' What other roles has she played over the years?

67.title: IMDb Exclusive #67 - Kimmy Robertson
67.plot: Actress Kimmy Robertson, who reprises her role as Lucy, the ditzy secretary, in the reboot of "Twin Peaks," is used to playing characters who aren't quite all there. "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of her previous roles.

68.title: IMDb Exclusive #68 - Alexandra Daddario
68.plot: Actress Alexandra Daddario, who plays Summer Quinn in the comedy 'Baywatch,' has been turning heads with her characters for years. "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of her previous roles.

69.title: IMDb Exclusive #69 - Pom Klementieff
69.plot: French actress Pom Klementieff is arguably one of the biggest breakout stars from the new Marvel film 'Guardians the Galaxy Vol. 2.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of her past roles.

70.title: IMDb Exclusive #70 - Sofia Boutella
70.plot: Before actress Sofia Boutella played the title role in the upcoming action film 'The Mummy,' she spent years as a professional dancer for various musical artists and commercials. "No Small Parts" takes a look at her past work.

71.title: IMDb Exclusive #71 - Chris Cooper
71.plot: Chris Cooper has made a career for himself playing a wide variety of eccentric characters since 1987. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his colorful acting career.

1.title: IMDb Exclusive #72 - Noah Taylor
1.plot: Australian actor Noah Taylor has a major role in the second season of the AMC series "Preacher." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his eclectic acting career.

2.title: IMDb Exclusive #73 - Ansel Elgort
2.plot: 23-year-old actor Ansel Elgort stars as Baby in the new Edgar Wright film 'Baby Driver.' "No Small Parts" takes a look back at his past roles.

3.title: IMDb Exclusive #74 - Jason Momoa
3.plot: Jason Momoa, perhaps best known for playing Kahl Drogo in "Game of Thrones," plays Aquaman in the upcoming superhero film 'Justice League,' as well as future films in the DC Comics Universe. What other roles has he played over the years?

4.title: IMDb Exclusive #75 - John Bradley
4.plot: John Bradley returns to "Game of Thrones" as steward of the Night's Watch, Samwell Tarly. "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of the other roles he's played over the years.

5.title: IMDb Exclusive #76 - Andy Serkis
5.plot: British actor Andy Serkis is perhaps best known for his iconic CGI performances in franchises like 'The Lord of the Rings' and, more recently, 'Planet of the Apes' and 'Star Wars.' What other roles has he played over the years?

6.title: IMDb Exclusive #77 - Tessa Thompson
6.plot: Versatile actress Tessa Thompson plays Valkyrie in the upcoming Marvel film 'Thor: Ragnarok.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of her best past roles.

7.title: IMDb Exclusive #78 - Jackie Earle Haley
7.plot: Jackie Earle Haley, who plays a major role in the upcoming 'Dark Tower' series, has been acting in film and television since he was nine years old and has more recently been associated with playing creepy or evil characters. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his career.

8.title: IMDb Exclusive #79 - Bella Ramsey
8.plot: Young Bella Ramsey has made a big impression as Lyanna Mormont in HBO's "Game of Thrones." "No Small Parts" takes a look at how she got into film and television and where her budding acting career is taking her.

9.title: IMDb Exclusive #80 - Lakeith Stanfield
9.plot: Actor and rapper Lakeith Stanfield is perhaps best known for his roles as Andre in 'Get Out' and Darius in "Atlanta." "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of his eclectic acting roles.

10.title: IMDb Exclusive #81 - Kristofer Hivju
10.plot: Kristofer Hivju is perhaps best known as wildling Tormund Giantsbane in HBO's "Game of Thrones." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his acting career, before and after the beard.

11.title: IMDb Exclusive #82 - Evan Rachel Wood
11.plot: Evan Rachel Wood has been nominated for a Primetime Emmy for her role as Dolores Abernathy in the HBO sci-fi drama series "Westworld." What other roles has she played over the years?

12.title: IMDb Exclusive #83 - Jonathan Banks
12.plot: Veteran actor Jonathan Banks is best known for his performance as Mike Ehrmantraut in "Better Call Saul" and "Breaking Bad." What are some other roles he's played over the years?

13.title: IMDb Exclusive #84 - Michael K. Williams
13.plot: Michael K. Williams, known for his intense performances in "The Wire" and "Boardwalk Empire," has been nominated for a Primetime Emmy for his performance as Freddy Knight in the HBO limited series "The Night Of." What other roles has he played?

14.title: IMDb Exclusive #85 - Elisabeth Moss
14.plot: Elisabeth Moss, best known for her role as Peggy Olson in the AMC series "Mad Men," has been nominated for a Primtime Emmy for her role as Offred in the Hulu series "The Handmaid's Tale." What roles has she played over the years?

15.title: IMDb Exclusive #86 - Harry Dean Stanton
15.plot: Harry Dean Stanton, who recently passed away at the age of 91, posthumously stars as the title character in the upcoming film 'Lucky.' No Small Parts gives a brief retrospective on his 60+ years in film and television.

16.title: IMDb Exclusive #87 - Dave Bautista
16.plot: Former WWE professional wrestler Dave Bautista plays Sapper, a fugitive replicant, in the new sci-fi film 'Blade Runner 2049.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at his roots and early acting roles.

17.title: IMDb Exclusive #88 - Martin Wallström
17.plot: Martin Wallstrom is perhaps best known for his role as the disturbed, Patrick Bateman-esque character Tyrell Wellick in USA's series "Mr. Robot." What other roles has he played over the years?

18.title: IMDb Exclusive #89 - Polllyanna McIntosh
18.plot: Pollyanna McIntosh returns in the newest season of "The Walking Dead" as Jadis, the leader of The Scavengers. "No Small Parts" takes a look at some other eccentric, dangerous characters she's played throughout her film and TV career.

19.title: IMDb Exclusive #90 - Cast of "Stranger Things"
19.plot: Noah Schnapp, Finn Wolfhard, Gaten Matarazzo, and Caleb McLaughlin make up most of the main cast of Netflix's "Stranger Things." "No Small Parts" takes a look at each of their careers in film, television, and theater.

20.title: IMDb Exclusive #91 - Holt McCallany
20.plot: Veteran actor Holt McCallany stars as FBI Agent Bill Tench in the new Netflix series "Mindhunter". What other roles has he played over the years?

21.title: IMDb Exclusive #92 - Sonequa Martin-Green
21.plot: Sonequa Martin-Green, perhaps best known as Sasha Williams on "The Walking Dead," stars as Michael Burnham in the new "Star Trek" series "Star Trek: Discovery." "No Small Parts" takes a look at her film and television career as well as her strengths as an actress.

22.title: IMDb Exclusive #93 - Dacre Montgomery
22.plot: Australian actor Dacre Montgomery plays Billy Hargrove, a simultaneously likable and dislikable antagonist, in "Stranger Things." What other roles has he played over the years?

23.title: IMDb Exclusive #94 - Gustaf Skarsgård
23.plot: Gustaf Skarsgård perhaps best known in America for playing eccentric shipbuilder Floki in "Vikings," has had a long acting career in Sweden since he was nine years old. Learn more about Gustaf's previous acting roles.

24.title: IMDb Exclusive #95 - Doug Jones
24.plot: Doug Jones, who plays Amphibian Man in 'The Shape of Water,' is a flexible, physically gifted performer who's made a living playing odd and memorable characters in heavy prosthetics and makeup. What roles has he played over the years?

25.title: IMDb Exclusive #96 - John Boyega
25.plot: John Boyega is best known for his role as stormtrooper-turned-rebel Finn in 'Star Wars: The Last Jedi,' and stars as Jake Pentecost in the upcoming sci-fi film 'Pacific Rim: Uprising.' What did John do before picking up a lightsaber?

26.title: IMDb Exclusive #97 - Meghan Markle
26.plot: Meghan Markle has played Rachel Zane on "Suits" for the past seven years, has been acting in film and television since 2002. What other roles has she played over the years?

27.title: IMDb Exclusive #98 - Cillian Murphy
27.plot: Versatile actor Cillian Murphy is known for his roles in 'Batman Begins,' '28 Days Later...,' 'Dunkirk,' and more recently the newest season of "Peaky Blinders." What other roles has he played over the years?

28.title: IMDb Exclusive #99 - Jodie Whitaker
28.plot: Jodie Whittaker stars as the first female Doctor in the long-running science fiction serial "Doctor Who." What other roles has she played over the years?

29.title: IMDb Exclusive #100 - Timothée Chalamet
29.plot: Timothée Chalamet earned an Oscar nom for his performance in 'Call Me by Your Name,' and is already generating buzz for 'Beautiful Boy.' What other roles has he played over the years?

30.title: IMDb Exclusive #101 - Daniel Kaluuya
30.plot: Daniel Kaluuya has been nominated for an Oscar for his performance in the horror-comedy 'Get Out.' What other roles has he played over the years?

31.title: IMDb Exclusive #102 - Sally Hawkins
31.plot: Sally Hawkins is best know for playing Elisa Esposito in 'The Shape of Water' and Poppy in 'Happy-Go-Lucky.' What other roles has she played over the years?

32.title: IMDb Exclusive #103 - Ann Dowd
32.plot: Before her critically acclaimed roles in "The Leftovers" and "The Handmaid's Tale," veteran actress Ann Dowd made a career of supporting roles in some of your favorite movies and TV shows.

33.title: IMDb Exclusive #104 - Lakeith Stanfield
33.plot: Actor and rapper Lakeith Stanfield is perhaps best known for his roles as Andre in 'Get Out' and Darius in "Atlanta." "No Small Parts" takes a look at some of his eclectic acting roles.

34.title: IMDb Exclusive #105 - Daniel Brühl
34.plot: Multitalented and multilingual actor Daniel Brühl, known for his breakout role as Frederick Zoller in 'Inglorious Basterds,' stars is Dr. Lazlo Kreizler in the period crime-drama series "The Alienist." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his life and career.

35.title: IMDb Exclusive #106 - Joel Kinnaman
35.plot: Joel Kinnaman is perhaps best known for his roles in "House of Cards," "The Killing," and the 2014 remake of 'RoboCop.' What other roles has he played over the years?

36.title: IMDb Exclusive #107 - Alden Ehrenreich
36.plot: Alden Ehrenreich plays a young Han Solo in the upcoming film 'Solo: A Star Wars Story.' But before sitting in the pilot's chair of the Millennium Falcon, what other roles did he play?

37.title: IMDb Exclusive #108 - Letitia Wright
37.plot: Actress Letitia Wright, known for her roles in "Black Mirror" and 'Urban Hymn,' plays tech genius Shuri in 'Black Panther.' What are some other roles she's played over the years?

38.title: IMDb Exclusive #109 - Chandler Riggs
38.plot: Chandler Riggs has played Carl Grimes on "The Walking Dead" since its very first season. What other roles has Chandler played before and during his tenure on the show?

39.title: IMDb Exclusive #110 - Laurie Metcalf
39.plot: In addition to high-profile projects like "Roseanne" and 'Lady Bird,' veteran actress Laurie Metcalf has been playing strong supporting characters in film and television since the 1980s. "No Small Parts" takes a look at her storied acting career.

40.title: IMDb Exclusive #111 - Allison Janney
40.plot: Allison Janney is a veteran actress known for playing strong, assertive characters in "The West Wing," "Mom," and 'I, Tonya.' What other roles has she played over the years?

41.title: IMDb Exclusive #112 - Krysten Ritter
41.plot: Krysten Ritter, who currently stars as the title character in "Jessica Jones," has played a number of rebellious characters, both comedic and dramatic. What are some other roles she's played over the years?

42.title: IMDb Exclusive #113 - Ian McElhinney
42.plot: Veteran character Ian McElhinney has been playing figures of authority since the early 1980s, like cops, clergies, Ser Barristan Selmy on "Game of Thrones," and, more recently, Val-El on "Krypton." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his long acting career.

43.title: IMDb Exclusive #114 - Jared Harris
43.plot: Actor Jared Harris, perhaps best known for his role as Lane Pryce on "Mad Men," plays Capt. Crozier in the AMC horror series "The Terror." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his eclectic acting career.

44.title: IMDb Exclusive #115 - Tye Sheridan
44.plot: Tye Sheridan currently stars as Wade, aka Parzival, in Steven Spielberg's adaptation of the best-selling science fiction novel "Ready Player One." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his other roles, including his early days as a child actor.

45.title: IMDb Exclusive #116 - Lennie James
45.plot: Veteran actor Lennie James is perhaps best known for his performance as Morgan Jones in "The Walking Dead," a character that has now crossed over into "Fear the Walking Dead." What other roles has he played over the years?

46.title: IMDb Exclusive #117 - Ella Purnell
46.plot: Up-and-coming British actress Ella Purnell, known for her roles in 'Never Let Me Go' and 'Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children,' stars in the new STARZ series "Sweetbitter." "No Small Parts" takes a look at Ella's transition from a child actor to to the adult actor she is now.

47.title: IMDb Exclusive #118 - James Marsden
47.plot: Actor James Marsden, known for playing Cyclops in 'X-Men' and Prince Edward in 'Enchanted,' returns to season two of HBO's "Westworld." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his vast acting career and his many "handsome guy" roles.

48.title: IMDb Exclusive #119 - Bradley Whitford
48.plot: Emmy award-winning actor Bradley Whitford is perhaps best known for his roles in "The West Wing," 'Get Out,' and plays a major character in the second season of "The Handmaid's Tale." "No Small Parts" takes a look at his acting career which, for a time, consisted primarily of jerk characters.

49.title: IMDb Exclusive #120 - Tom Holland
49.plot: Tom Holland returns as Peter Parker/Spider-Man in the newest MCU film 'Avengers: Infinity War.' "No Small Parts" takes a look at Tom's previous acting roles, including his stint dancing on stage as Billy Elliot.

50.title: IMDb Exclusive #121 - William Zabka
50.plot: William Zabka is perhaps best known for playing Johnny Lawrence in 'The Karate Kid,' as well as a host of other bully characters in the '80s and '90s. "No Small Parts" takes a look at his acting career.

51.title: IMDb Exclusive #122 - Riley Keough
51.plot: Actress and model Riley Keough, known for her Golden Globe Award-nominated performance in "The Girlfriend Experience," plays Sarah in 'It Follows' director David Robert Mitchell's new film 'Under the Silver Lake.' What other roles has she played over the years?

52.title: IMDb Exclusive #123 - Zazie Beetz
52.plot: Zazie Beetz, perhaps best known for her role as Vanessa in Donald Glover's "Atlanta," plays Domino in 'Deadpool 2.' What other roles has she played over the years?

53.title: IMDb Exclusive #124 - Michael B. Jordan
53.plot: Actor Michael B. Jordan is best known for his roles in "The Wire," 'Fruitvale Station,' 'Creed,' and 'Black Panther.' But what other roles as he played over the years?

54.title: Stars Early Parts - Daniel Day-Lewis
54.plot: In 2017 Daniel Day-Lewis announced his retirement from acting, citing his performance in "Phantom Thread' as his final film role. Before becoming a three-time Oscar winner, what are some his lesser-known roles?

imdb.title: No Small Parts
plot: _No Small Parts_ (qv) is a fan-made documentary web series about character actors. Most episodes focus on a specific character actor and chronicle their life and career in the entertainment industry.::Brandon Hardesty
